content.text:
# Draft:8th Astra Midseason Movie Awards

}}
The winners of the 8th Astra Midseason Movie Awards, will be announced by the Hollywood Creative Alliance on 3 July 2025.
The nominations were announced on 30 June 2025. Sinners led the nominations with seven, followed by Materialists with six and F1 with five nominations.
Winners and nominees
Winners are listed first and highlighted with boldface
